room_title: Escape room "Tiger's Eye" by ConTRAPtions Escape Rooms in Fort Collins
review: This was the first time for us all. We were successful in heisting the Tiger's Eye. Staff was very friendly and helpful. It was a fun experience for our three-generation family of 10. We all said we're interested in doing another one.

room_title: Escape room "Tiger's Eye" by ConTRAPtions Escape Rooms in Fort Collins
review: We had a group of five escape room enthusiasts in the Tiger's Eye room and had a great time. The room itself had really interesting and state-of-the-art technology and was filled with many puzzles, difficult enough to keep us entertained but not impossible to solve. A great room for experienced players. The staff was also very friendly.

room_title: Escape room "Tiger's Eye" by ConTRAPtions Escape Rooms in Fort Collins
review: The Tiger's Eye room was super fun. Finished it with 3 people which was especially gratifying, even with only a remaining 38 seconds.

room_title: Escape room "Tiger's Eye" by ConTRAPtions Escape Rooms in Fort Collins
review: Very well done!!! We escaped the Tiger's Eye room literally at the last second! Definitely would do this again and highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Tiger's Eye" by ConTRAPtions Escape Rooms in Fort Collins
review: Tigers Eye was a neat room full of high tech logic! We enjoyed that it was different from many of the other rooms, and still quite a challenge.
